page.title: 10GYPSUM MINING NEAR BUNNY
page.content: My dad works at the Gotham Gypsum Mine near Bunny.The mine runs for about 3 miles underground and one of the long tunnels, called the Silver Seal Mine comes out at Bunny. Gypsum has been mined in Bunny for 200 years. Five rocks are mined, called;{Satin {Spar,Marl,Anhydrite,Alabaster}and most of all{Gypsum.}The machines he uses are a drill rig for drilling,ready for blasting, and a load haul dump machine which loads,hauls,dumps and transports blasted rock from the rock face to the crusher. There are about 50 workers down the mine and about 150 workers on top. The Gypsum is made into plaster by grinding it and then cooking it and grinding it again. Many chemicals are added. The plaster is bagged and sold. A miner's job is fairly hard work and my dad works from 0800 to 1700 hrs. Some weeks he works the night shift.
